details.title: The World Wide Web leads a revolution in ATE programming environments
details.abstract: New software technologies, including the World Wide Web, may seem far removed from the tasks facing test program set (TPS) developers, but they promise to revolutionize the way TPS data is organized, presented, and used. This paper will describe how an integrated TPS development and execution environment can capitalize on these new technologies to improve test programming efficiency
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
